field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the OSPF service.

field.label: CARP demote
field.help: Register CARP status monitor. When no neighbors are found, consider this node less attractive. Requires syslog enabled with “Debugging” logging. Incompatible with “Enable CARP Failover”.

field.label: Router ID
field.help: Router ID as an IPv4 Address to uniquely identify the router.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway.

field.label: Always Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: Always sends default gateway information, regardless of availability.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway Metric
field.help: Allows manipulation of the metric when advertising the default gateway.
